message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal for both of us.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay a premium for the product, but I'm trying to stay within a certain budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I can't go lower than $9,000.  This is still a good deal for you, considering the value of the product to you.  Let me know if you're interested.

I understand your position, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $8,750. I think this is a fair price for both of us, considering the value of the product to me.
